item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)

item.title: The Future of Mobile: Android/iOS, Flutter and Native @Raywenderlich.com
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Raywenderlich.com, Online Abstract In this Roundtable Talk, Kevin Moore, Kevin Galligan, Nishant Srivastava and Joe Howard discuss the state of mobile and what platform you should use when starting a brand new project.
item.dc:creator: Nishant Srivastava

item.title: My love-hate relationship with Android Studio @GDG Ahmedabad
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: GDG Ahmedabad Live Webinar, Ahmedabad, India Abstract Android Studio is the tool of the trade hands down. When it comes to Android (app/library/IoT) development, the first thing that comes to mind is to install Android Studio and get going from there.
